short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Embark on a serene journey with Frieren Live Wallpaper, featuring the calm and mystical aura of Frieren, the elf mage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a tranquil escape with this beautifully animated theme. Enjoy quick site access, customizable shortcuts, and an integrated clock and calendar. The built-in search bar ensures seamless browsing.

🖼️ Live Wallpaper: Immerse in the magical world of Frieren with stunning visuals.
🔗 Popular Site Shortcuts: Access frequently visited websites instantly.
➕ Add Custom Shortcuts: Personalize your new tab with your favorite links.
🗓️ Calendar & Time: Stay organized with a sleek date and time display.
🔍 Web Search Bar: Browse effortlessly with your preferred search engine.
Discover more anime-inspired themes, check out our Privacy Policy, or uninstall easily through the provided links.
